subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Andre Brown, a running back for the Giants who came up with a song celebrating the team’s Super Bowl victory, was suspended for violating the N.F.L.’s performance-enhancing drugs policy.
snippet: Andre Brown, a running back for the Giants who came up with a song celebrating the team’s Super Bowl victory, was suspended for violating the N.F.L.’s performance-enhancing drugs policy.
